Package server.game

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.game.GameState
  • public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    This class transmits moves done by players in a game.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMove

        public void sendMove​(java.lang.String name,
                     int x,
                     int y)
        Sends a move done by player to all other players in the game by iterating through the list of players.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the player who made a move
        x - horizontal coordinate of the players new position
        y - vertical coordinate of the players new position

      • endRace

        public void endRace​(java.lang.String name)
        Called upon the end of the race, displays results of the race into the chat of all players. Also sends a command resetting lobby state and activating practice mode.
        Parameters:
        name - username of the player belonging in the lobby of the race.

      • updateHighscore

        void updateHighscore​(java.lang.String name)
        This method keeps the text-file containing the points up to date.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the player, whose highscore needs to be updated.
